Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: உளவரை தூக்காத ஒப்புர வாண்மை வளவரை வல்லைக் கெடும்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: The measure of his wealth will quickly perish, whose liberality weighs not the measure of his property.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A well-intentioned but foolishly generous person is giving away wealth. Their source of wealth is a large, beautifully woven basket ('வளவரை').
Layered_Composition.Midground: They are giving away handfuls of golden grain without looking into the basket to check how much is left ('உளவரை தூக்காத'). As a result, they do not see that the bottom of the basket is already bare.
Layered_Composition.Background: The basket, representing their wealth, is quickly and completely emptying ('வல்லைக் கெடும்'), and soon they will have nothing left to give or to live on.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: The wealth of someone whose benevolence is not measured against their resources will be swiftly destroyed.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The basket of wealth is the central object. The act of giving without looking into it represents unmeasured generosity. The visible bottom of the basket signifies the impending ruin.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Foolish generosity, impending ruin, cautionary, tragic.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A bright, perhaps naively optimistic light at the start. As the basket empties, the light on the giver should dim, and shadows should lengthen, indicating their approaching poverty.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A shot from an angle that allows the viewer to see inside the emptying basket, a fact hidden from the giver.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, with detailed textures on the woven basket and the golden grain.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: Dynamic lighting that changes to reflect the diminishing wealth.

Negative_Prompt: giver looking into the basket, magical refilling basket, sad recipients, text artifacts.

Hyperparameters.seed: Explore variations for the design of the basket.
